pages.text: $(li)Hoglins are hostil creatures that can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)They may drop Raw Porkchop and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/leather)Leather$(/l) upon death.$(br)$(li)They can be bred by giving them a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/crimson_fungi)Crimson Fungi$(/l).$(br)$(li)They are afraid of the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/warped_fungus)Warped Fungus$(/l) and the Nether Portal.
When a Hoglin is on the Overworld, it shakes and then transform in a Zombie Hoglin, also know as $(l)Zoglin$().

The Zoglin is a variant of the common Hoglin than drops $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/rotten_flesh)Rotten Flesh$(/l) upon death. It will even attack $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/armor_stand)Armor Stands$(/l).
